pepc-e/cutvector.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 subroutine cutvector(r_in, face_nr, n, r_out)
00002     !
00003     ! cuts a vector on the face face_nr
00004     ! and optionally puts out thr normal vector
00005     !
00006     use physvars
00007 
00008     implicit none
00009     
00010     real, dimension(1:3), intent(in)  :: r_in
00011     real, dimension(1:3), intent(out) :: n, r_out
00012     real, dimension(1:3)              :: r_affin, temp
00013     integer, intent(in)               :: face_nr
00014     real, dimension(1:3, 1:3)         :: T
00015     real                              :: c_status, phi, psi, gamma
00016 
00017     r_affin = r_in - plasma_centre
00018     select case (target_geometry) 
00019     case (0) ! slab
00020         select case (face_nr)
00021         case (1, 2) ! x-y-planes
00022             n = (/0., 0., 1./)
00023             if (face_nr == 2) n = -n
00024             r_affin = .5 * z_plasma * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00025         case (3, 4) ! x-z-planes
00026             n = (/0., 1., 0./)
00027             if (face_nr == 4) n = -n
00028             r_affin = .5 * y_plasma * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00029         case (5, 6) ! y-z-planes
00030             n = (/1., 0., 0./)
00031             if (face_nr == 6) n = -n
00032             r_affin = .5 * x_plasma * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00033         end select
00034         r_out = r_affin + plasma_centre
00035         
00036     case (1) ! sphere
00037         n = - r_affin / sqrt(dot_product(r_affin, r_affin))
00038         r_out = r_sphere * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n)) + plasma_centre
00039         
00040     case (2) ! disc
00041         select case (face_nr)
00042         case (1) ! zylinder
00043             n = (/0., -r_affin(2), -r_affin(3)/)
00044             n = n / sqrt(dot_product(n, n))
00045             r_affin = r_sphere * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00046         case (2, 3) ! y-z-planes
00047             n = (/1., 0., 0./)
00048             if (face_nr == 3) n = -n
00049             r_affin = .5 * x_plasma * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00050         end select
00051         r_out = r_affin + plasma_centre
00052         
00053     case (3) ! wire
00054         select case (face_nr)
00055         case (1) ! zylinder
00056             n = (/-r_affin(1), -r_affin(2), 0./)
00057             n = n / sqrt(dot_product(n, n))
00058             r_affin = r_sphere * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00059         case (2, 3) ! x-y-planes
00060             n = (/0., 0., 1./)
00061             if (face_nr == 3) n = -n
00062             r_affin = .5 * z_plasma * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00063         end select
00064         r_out = r_affin + plasma_centre
00065         
00066     case (4) ! ellipsoid
00067         T = reshape((/1., 0., 0., 0., x_plasma / y_plasma, 0., 0., 0., x_plasma / z_plasma/), (/3, 3/))
00068         temp = matmul(T, r_affin)
00069         r_out = r_sphere * x_plasma * r_affin / sqrt(dot_product(temp, temp))
00070         temp = r_sphere * x_plasma * temp / sqrt(dot_product(temp, temp))
00071         phi = atan(temp(1) / sqrt(dot_product(temp, temp) - temp(1)**2))
00072         psi = atan(temp(1) * sqrt(dot_product(r_out, r_out) - temp(1)**2) / (dot_product(temp, temp) - temp(1)**2))
00073         phi = phi - psi
00074         call rotate(phi, temp, n)
00075         n = -n / sqrt(dot_product(n, n))
00076         r_out = r_out + plasma_centre
00077         
00078     case (5) ! prism
00079         gamma = atan(y_plasma / (2 * x_plasma))
00080         select case (face_nr)
00081         case (1, 2) ! x-y-planes
00082             n = (/0., 0.,-1./)
00083             if (face_nr == 2) n = -n
00084             r_affin = .5 * z_plasma * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00085         case (3) ! y-z-plane
00086             n = (/1., 0., 0./)
00087             r_affin = .5 * x_plasma * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00088         case (4, 5) ! the other planes
00089             n = (/-sin(gamma), +cos(gamma),0./)
00090             r_affin(2) = tan(gamma) * r_affin(1) - y_plasma / 4.
00091             if (face_nr == 5) then
00092                 n(2) = -n(2)
00093                 r_affin(2) = -r_affin(2)
00094             end if
00095         end select
00096         r_out = r_affin + plasma_centre
00097         
00098     case (6) ! semisphere
00099         temp = r_affin - (/-r_sphere / 2., 0., 0./)
00100         select case (face_nr)
00101         case (1) ! semisphere
00102             n = -temp
00103             n = n / sqrt(dot_product(n, n))
00104             r_affin = r_sphere * temp / abs(dot_product(temp, n)) + (/-r_sphere / 2., 0., 0./)
00105         case (2) ! plane
00106             n = (/-1., 0., 0./)
00107             r_affin = .5 * r_sphere * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00108         end select
00109         r_out = r_affin + plasma_centre
00110         
00111     case (7) ! hollow ball
00112         select case (face_nr)
00113         case (1) ! outer sphere
00114             n = -r_affin
00115             n = n / sqrt(dot_product(n, n))
00116             r_affin = r_sphere * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00117         case (2) ! inner sphere
00118             n = r_affin
00119             n = n / sqrt(dot_product(n, n))
00120             r_affin = (r_sphere - x_plasma) * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00121         end select
00122         r_out = r_affin + plasma_centre
00123         
00124     case (8) ! hollow semisphere
00125         temp = r_affin - (/-r_sphere / 2., 0., 0./)
00126         select case (face_nr)
00127         case (1) ! outer semisphere
00128             n = -temp
00129             n = n / sqrt(dot_product(n, n))
00130             r_affin = r_sphere * temp / abs(dot_product(temp, n)) + (/-r_sphere / 2., 0., 0./)
00131         case (2) ! inner semisphere
00132             n = temp
00133             n = n / sqrt(dot_product(n, n))
00134             r_affin = (r_sphere - x_plasma) * temp / abs(dot_product(temp, n)) + (/-r_sphere / 2., 0., 0./)
00135         case (3) ! y-z-plane
00136             n = (/-1., 0., 0./)
00137             r_affin = .5 * r_sphere * r_affin / abs(dot_product(r_affin, n))
00138         end select
00139         r_out = r_affin + plasma_centre
00140         
00141     end select
00142     
00143 contains
00144 
00145     !
00146     ! Rotates a vector around the y-axis
00147     ! with an angle phi (needed for the 
00148     ! ellipsoid)
00149     !
00150     subroutine rotate(phi, v_in, v_out)
00151         real                            :: phi
00152         real, dimension(1:3)            :: v_in, v_out
00153         real                            :: c, s
00154         real, dimension(1:3, 1:3)       :: R
00155 
00156         c = cos(phi)
00157         s = sin(phi)
00158 
00159         R = reshape((/1., 0., 0., 0., c, s, 0., -s, c/), (/3, 3/))
00160         v_out = matmul(R, v_in)
00161     end subroutine rotate
00162 
00163 end subroutine cutvector
